title: Arachnoid
wikitext:
[[File:Arachnoid.jpg|thumb|right|Arachnoid]] '''Species:''' Arachnoid
'''Home Planet:''' Unknown

'''Arachnoid'''
Arachnoids were a species of sentient arachnids with a legspan of approximately 2.5 meters. They were covered in dense black and gray fur, and possessed four eyes and powerful hind legs. [[Ptak-Sok]], copilot of the [[Black Widow]], was an Arachnoid.

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
'''DEXTERITY''' 3D/5D
'''KNOWLEDGE''' 1D/3D
'''MECHANICAL''' 1D/3D
'''PERCEPTION''' 1D+1/3D+1
'''STRENGTH''' 3D/5D
'''TECHNICAL''' 3D/4D+2

'''Special Abilities:''' *'''''Web:''''' Arachnoids can spin webs with a Strength of 5D. *'''''Poison:''''' With a successful sting attack, the Arachnoid injects a poison that does 5D stun damage. '''Move:''' 11/13
'''Size:''' 1.3 meters tall, 2.5 meters diameter
'''Source:''' Wookieepedia (For the Arachnoid Description)
